name: Faetful encounter
description:
For project 10 for my game a week class  we each got custom individual prompts! My prompt was riffing on my week two game, Reminiscent of You. The prompt was 'Escapism with a purpose'. So after convincing myself not to write an essay instead, I made this game! It was kind of an excuse to write the shitty fantasy that I love, but it was also an attempt at making a point about projects and creativity. I've had a lot of people tell me my ideas aren't good at first, but I think eventually if you have faith in yourself and your creativity that you can develop a good idea into a fantastic result. Trust yourself! Take a chance! Like you do with your new fae friend :)

Also, many many thanks to my friends who play tested this an hour before it was due, you guys are the best <3
